Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“The {Color Blue}〖Central Square〗{Color White} is up ahead.”
Seifer{Line}“Hey! All you Galbadian cowards out there!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Давайте, кто на меня?!{Line} Не заставляйте ждать!”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Come out’n show your faces!{Line} Don’t leave me hangin’ now!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“YO! What are you doing!?{Line} We’re not gonna make it{Line} if we don’t leave now!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“YO! What are you doing!?{Line} We’re not gonna make it{Line} if we don’t leave now!”
